Plot: This fictional memoir, the first of an autobiographical trilogy, traces a self professed failure's nightmarish decent into the underside of American life and his resurrection to the wisdom that emerges from despair.
Characters: Fred Exley, Bunny Sue Allorgee, Earl Exley, Mrs. Exley, Mr. Blue (A Fan's Notes), Patience Exley, Christopher Plumpton
Setting: New York State (United States), Chicago, Illinois (United States)
